nodes.bodyText: Is the intent to log an error here, as you mentioned in the refdoc?
It was, but then I removed it in the most recent commit so we wouldn't need to include any android headers, per kmandrika's suggestion. I'll update the comment to match reality.

All definitions within this file should be declared as inline, otherwise, you are going to run into a "multiple definition" compiler error. You can test this by including this file into two separate translation units and compiling.
